Name: cmd add
Detailed help: Add a new parameter to a command

Name: crc32
Detailed help: Calculate CRC32 on a VMEM area

Name: list download
Detailed help: Download a list of remote parameters

Name: list forget
Detailed help: Forget remote parameters. Omit or set node to -1 to include all.

Name: pull
Detailed help: Pull all metrics from given CSP node(s)

Name: python
Detailed help:
Starts an interactive Python interpreter in the current CSH process
or execute the script in given file.
This allows you to run pretty much any Python code, particularly code using PyCSH which allows for interacting
with CSP nodes.

Use "Control-D" to exit the interpreter and return to CSH.

Name: rdp opt
Detailed help: Set RDP options to use in stream and file transfers

Name: require version csh
Detailed help:
Checks whether CSH fulfills the specified version requirements.

 A failed comparison may perform a varity of actions, based on the specified error action.
 Possible error actions are:
 - Quit: Which will exit CSH,
 - Error: Which will break execution of a script,
 - Warn: Which simply prints the specified message,
 (Single letters may be used for error codes, e.g 'Q' for Quit).

 Version constraint supports the typical comparisons: "==", "!=", ">=", "<=", ">" and "<".
 For example: >=2.5-20

Name: run
Detailed help:
Runs commands in the specified file. 
Sets the following environment variables during execution:

- __FILE__ to the path and name of the executed file
- __FILE_DIR__ to the directory containing the executed file, useful for running other files located relative to __FILE__

Name: sleep
Detailed help: Sleep the specified amount of milliseconds

Name: var clear
Detailed help: Clear all environment variables in CSH

Name: var expand
Detailed help: Display the given INPUT string with references to defined variables expanded.

Name: var get
Detailed help: Show the value of the given 'NAME' environment variable in CSH, shows nothing if variable is not defined

Name: var set
Detailed help: Create or update an environment variable in CSH

Name: var show
Detailed help: Print the defined variables and their values

Name: var unset
Detailed help: Remove an environment variable in CSH

Name: version
Detailed help: Print CSH version (and date if verbose)
